page.title: 16Wellbank football fives
page.content: In the{five-a-sides}there are under 12's,under 15's,seniors and veterans.The finals are at the fete.If you win, the team gets a shield and each player gets a medal.The runners up get a medal each.A lot of teams come from Dundee It is 15 minutes a game.They start at 7 o'clock and finish at 9 o'clock.There are about 60 teams altogether in the fives.They play about nine games a night for two weeks.It is Â£2.50 per team,50p each. At the five-a-sides you can get juice,tea,sweets,lollipops,hot dogs and hamburgers.Juice and tea are 10p,sweets and lollipops are 2p,hot dogs are 20p and hamburgers are 25p.The shop is in the kitchen of the hall.
